I livelli iniziali li ho trovati poco stimolanti. Probabilmente perchè si dovevano risolvere senza avere chiaro il perchè. Dopo però la storia comincia a prendere piede e si forma un'idea più chiara di quello che succede e del perchè succede.
Trama divertente, livelli complessi ma tutti fattibili e giochi di fisica davvero intriganti. Però l'ho trovato un po corto. Mi aspettavo che durasse di più, parlando della partita in singolo.

Pregi:

+ Enigmi di fisica davvero geniali
+ Contesto affascinante
+ Molto humor

Difetti:

- Fase iniziale poco stimolante
- Campagna in singolo non molto longeva
- Zero rigiocabilità

Именно эту линейку игр я считаю лучшей от Valve, никакой Half-Life или Left 4 Dead с ней не сравнится. Есть ещё CS и да она хороша, но там только мультиплеер. В Portal есть всё отличный кооператив, великолепный и интересный сюжет, неплохая графика, головоломки, на которых по сути и построен весь геймплей. Но если в совакупности всё это посчитать, то перед нами просто шедевр. 10/10

I just finished single player after 9 hours of playtime and I decided I better write a review. I just want to say that I loved this game and it was perfect in almost every way. When I was playing I could really tell how hard valve worked on it. I couldn't find a bug, glitch, or anything of the sort anywhere. The dialouge was amazing and so was the story. I think this may have been the best dialouge of any game I've ever played. The puzzles are terrific, and engaging but they never get too tedious. There are awesome moments when something clicks in a puzzle and it is terrific when that happens and you finish a very hard puzzle. It is awesomely priced when you see how much work was put into the game to perfect it and make it as awesome as it is. I am very impressed. As for those who may be worrying there is not enough content I still have co-op mode to do as well as an infinite amount of community test chambers. It is easy to see why this is the top rated game on steam. Probably the only con this game has is it can be a bit hard at times, I myself never needed a guide but I can easily see how others might and there were parts where I very nearly broke down and looked at a guide but I figured it out right at that moment. I think that is all I have to say, and I highly reccomend trying this game, it is worth it.
fantastic
Portal já era muito bom, o 2 conseguiu ser melhor ainda, criativo, ótima jogabilidade e história perfeita! Esse é o resumo deste jogo incrível.

Esse jogo consegue ser ainda melhor que o original, aumentou consideravelmente a duração e existem puzzles bem complexos, que se misturam com partes de plataforma. dublagem impecável, gráficos muito bons, totalmente compatível com controle do xbox. só uma coisa não me agradou que foram os loadings que eram em excesso, às vezes no meio da ação o que quebrava um pouco a experiência. Ainda assim um dos melhores jogos pela Valve.

Woow... Speechless, I haven't finished the game yet and I am already astonished by it.

The attention to detail, the most little things from music to secret rooms and very well placed spotlights. 
The emotion rollercoaster is real :D

This game is amazing, I can only think of the ammount of effort put into it by the developer team. 
This is a piece of art, a true relic of mankind's most creative achievements.

Thank you Valve for making it happen <3

Note: If you don't have it yet, I really don't know what you are waiting for. :D

Let me start off with this: extremely fun. This first-person game puts your mind to the test (for science) to solve puzzles. But not normal puzzles. They're puzzles that you must use portals, lasers and anything given to you to solve! This game has never gotten boring for me. The storyline is amazing, I love the characters in it and even when you beat the game (finish the story) there's still more to do! There's co-op maps that you can play with your friends, families, enemies, hitmen, or whoever that has Portal 2! When you run out of maps that come with the game there's more maps! You can download maps on the workshop that were made from fellow Portal 2 players! 
   If you're thinking of buying this game, I highly recommend it. The fun never ends in this game and it's well worth the money!
Отличная логическая игра!
Overall good game. Starts to drag after about the 5 hour mark though in the single player. Co-op is pretty fun.

Simplesmente incrível!!!!
Gráficos ótimos, jogabilidade ótima, desafios ótimos, o jogo é ótimo! Começando a jogar, a pessoa não para mais, cada vez ela quer fazer mais fases e as horas vão passando, ótimo para se divertir.
Modo singleplayer: Muito divertido, com desafios envolventes, nunca desista, pois mesmo parecendo que não tem saída, sempre terá uma e pensando se achará uma e depois de tanto quebrar a cabeça, vai perceber que era algo simples.
Modo multiplayer: Divertido d++, é preciso que os dois jogadores ajudem um ao outro, fazendo os dois pensarem, rirem e até brigarem de leve, esse modo é um dos pontos que faz com que o jogo seja incrível, jogar com os amigos é muito legal.
Nota: 10/10

You already know what this game is so why you are looking at reviews just blows my mind, but anyway let me get on with this. Portal 2 is the Splended sequel to Valve's Portal. Its a First Person puzzle shooter that involves quick wits and the abilty to think with portals. Just as the first game you must traverse through various test chambers with nothing but your handy,dandy portal gun and your own brain power. This game however adds more mechanics to its slew of puzzles. From light bridges to gels that change how you move, this game will surly be a challange and if you enjoy puzzle games then i recomend you get it.

And the story is, well... wow.

Поиграв я не нашел ничего интересного для себя. Игра радует вступлением, шутками, физикой игрой света и тени, атмосферой, но геимплей меня не зацепил. Я не понимаю эту игру. Не вижу я для себя никакого интереса ее проходить. 

При этом мне симпатичны персонажи роботы, идея разумной машины. Чего-то мне не хватило в этой игре чтобы оценить ее. Думаю это сюжета основанного на моих решениях и кастомизации. Возможно все это где-то есть но я до этого не добрался и интереса искать не возникло. Чей это недостаток мой или игры - мне не известно. 

Не буду рекомендовать эту игру не потому что она плохая, а потому что я даже не могу оценить её.
[spoiler] Да лан, пиздешь все это. В ней надо думать, а мой еще несформировавшийся мозг не может выполнять такие сложные задачи, которые предоставляет мне Portal 2, лол.[/spoiler]
